name: UnderTale Last Breath 2 player mode (BETA)
description:
This game is created for two players and was created on Scratch.

Controls of Sans: W, A, S, D keys to knockback; I, J, K, L keys to bone slam; R, T, Y keys to summon spinning bone (Different colors each); Q key to change selected attack; Space key to use selected attack (Bone isn't ready yet); E key to change Soul type (Blue and Red); B to use Bad Time (Only when energy is 5 or less).

Controls of Chara/Frisk (Soul): Arrow keys to move; M key to use the selected button.

If the Soul hits Sans when 5 or less energy, Sans will be killed and the Soul will win.

Enjoy!
